title: Run from Me
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Run From Me par Yeast
Couplet 1 :

Touching down

I saw your face under the dark blue sky 

Chasing you out

But what's the point if I can do no harm ?



Refrain :



And I love to run to run to run your way

'Cause I know you run you run you run from me



Couplet 2 :



Why would I want to keep on playing this game ? 

I was told "if you don't have it, you won't miss it" 


And I'm feeling down when I can feel so right

I have caught while playing with the sun



Refrain 2 :



And I love to run to run to run your way

'Cause I know you run you run you run from me



Pont : 



'Cause I (x4) 



Refrain 3 :



And I know you run you run you run from me 

'Cause I love to show to show the sun again
